description: Sample actions for characters and monsters

generalActions.name: Attack
generalActions.description: Make a melee or ranged weapon attack

generalActions.name: Dash
generalActions.description: Gain extra movement for the current turn

generalActions.name: Disengage
generalActions.description: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks for the rest of the turn

generalActions.name: Dodge
generalActions.description: Until the start of your next turn, any attack roll made against you has disadvantage

generalActions.name: Help
generalActions.description: You can lend your aid to another creature in the completion of a task

generalActions.name: Hide
generalActions.description: Make a Dexterity (Stealth) check in an attempt to hide

generalActions.name: Ready
generalActions.description: Choose an action and a trigger condition

generalActions.name: Search
generalActions.description: Devote your attention to finding something

generalActions.name: Use an Object
generalActions.description: You normally interact with an object while doing something else

Fighter.name: Second Wind
Fighter.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm

Fighter.name: Action Surge
Fighter.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment

Wizard.name: Arcane Recovery
Wizard.description: You have learned to regain some of your magical energy by studying your spellbook

Wizard.name: Ritual Casting
Wizard.description: You can cast a wizard spell as a ritual if that spell has the ritual tag

Cleric.name: Divine Domain
Cleric.description: Choose one domain related to your deity

Cleric.name: Channel Divinity
Cleric.description: You gain the ability to channel divine energy directly from your deity

Rogue.name: Sneak Attack
Rogue.description: You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction

Rogue.name: Cunning Action
Rogue.description: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly

Ranger.name: Favored Enemy
Ranger.description: You have significant experience studying, tracking, hunting, and even talking to a certain type of enemy

Ranger.name: Natural Explorer
Ranger.description: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment

Paladin.name: Divine Sense
Paladin.description: The presence of strong evil registers on your senses like a noxious odor

Paladin.name: Lay on Hands
Paladin.description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds

Barbarian.name: Rage
Barbarian.description: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity

Barbarian.name: Reckless Attack
Barbarian.description: You can throw aside all concern for defense to attack with fierce desperation

Bard.name: Bardic Inspiration
Bard.description: You can inspire others through stirring words or music

Bard.name: Song of Rest
Bard.description: You can use soothing music or oration to help revitalize your wounded allies

Druid.name: Wild Shape
Druid.description: You can use your action to magically assume the shape of a beast

Druid.name: Druidic
Druid.description: You know Druidic, the secret language of druids

Monk.name: Unarmored Defense
Monk.description: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier

Monk.name: Martial Arts
Monk.description: Your practice of martial arts gives you mastery of combat styles that use unarmed strikes and monk weapons

Sorcerer.name: Sorcery Points
Sorcerer.description: You have 2 sorcery points, and you gain more as you reach higher levels

Sorcerer.name: Flexible Casting
Sorcerer.description: You can use your sorcery points to gain additional spell slots

Warlock.name: Pact Magic
Warlock.description: Your arcane research and the magic bestowed on you by your patron have given you facility with spells

Warlock.name: Eldritch Invocations
Warlock.description: In your study of occult lore, you have unearthed eldritch invocations

monsterActions.name: Multiattack
monsterActions.description: The monster makes two melee attacks
